title: dummy-app-202403200917
content:
apiVersion: "core.oam.dev/v1beta1"
kind: "Application"
metadata:
  name: "dummy-app-deploy"
spec:
  components:
  - name: "dummy-app-worker"
    type: "webservice"
    properties:
      image: "docker.io/rsprat/mytestrepo:v1"
      imagePullPolicy: "Always"
      cmd:
      - "python"
      - "worker.py"
      env:
      - name: "mqtt_ip"
        value: "broker.hivemq.com"
      - name: "mqtt_port"
        value: "1883"
      - name: "mqtt_subscribe_topic"
        value: "$share/workers/neb/test/input"    
      - name: "nebulous_ems_ip"
        valueFrom:
          fieldRef:
            fieldPath: status.hostIP
      - name: "nebulous_ems_port"
        value: "61610"
      - name: "nebulous_ems_user"
        value: "aaa"
      - name: "nebulous_ems_password"
        value: "111"
      - name: "nebulous_ems_metrics_topic"
        value: "realtime.job_process_time_instance"
    traits:
    - type: "scaler"
      properties:
        replicas: 1


  policies:
  - name: "target-default"
    type: "topology"
    properties:
      namespace: "default"
  workflow:
    steps:
    - name: "deploy2default"
      type: "deploy"
      properties:
        policies:
        - "target-default"
